transcription: Hi friends my name is Mai today we are cooking a favorite dish called grilled lemongrass chicken as you can see these are mature lemongrass plants.  For the grilled lemongrass chicken we are using chicken thigh meat, to marinate the chicken thighs you will need oyster sauce, fish sauce, soy sauce, sesame oil, brown sugar, honey, garlic,  garlic cloves, and lemongrass stalks. If you would like this delicious recipe please visit our website.  place the sliced lemongrass and the garlic cloves into a food processor. in a medium saucepan combine the chopped lemongrass and garlic with brown sugar, soy sauce,  soy sauce, fish sauce, sesame oil, oyster sauce, and honey. Mix together.  now grill the chicken  so  and here you have delicious grilled lemongrass chicken served with sliced tomato, cucumber,  steamed rice. We hope you enjoyed watching our video, if you would like this delicious recipe please visit our website.
